all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
My son, peace be unto thy soul; thine adversity and thine afflictions shall be but a small moment;
Doctrine and Covenants 121:7
Quote of the Day
"Children really do love … , and that love can carry over into their other relationships in the playground of life."
President Jeffrey R. Holland | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
